akas: Les Gardiens de la Galaxie France
Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy USA (complete title)
akas from release info: Les Gardiens de la Galaxie France
Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy USA (complete title)

1.title: Mission: Breakout
1.plot: The Guardians must work together to escape the elaborate prisons created for them by The Collector.

2.title: Back in the New York Groove
2.plot: The Guardians join forces with Spider-Man in an effort to defeat Thanos' super-powered symbiote.

3.title: Drive My Carnage
3.plot: Thanos has been able to harness the power of the Carnage Symbiote. Spider-Man teams up with the Guardians to stop him from wielding the ultimate weapon.

4.title: I Fought the Law
4.plot: The Guardians run into trouble when they attempt to transport the notorious criminal, Thanos, across the galaxy.

5.title: Titan Up
5.plot: The Guardians chase Thanos and Sam Alexander to Thanos' home planet of Titan where they discover a gladiatorial arena featuring Jesse Alexander...Nova's father.

6.title: Money Changes Everything
6.plot: After the Guardians collect their huge bounty for the capture of Thanos, the group splits up and we follow the separate adventures of Rocket and Groot as they deal with their new found wealth.

7.title: Sisters Are Doin' It for Themselves
7.plot: After the Guardians collect their huge bounty for the capture of Thanos, the group splits up and we follow the separate adventures of Gamora and her sister, Nebula, as they make amends for their past deeds with her new found wealth.

8.title: We Are the Champions
8.plot: After the Guardians collect their huge bounty for the capture of Thanos, the group splits up and we follow the separate adventures of Drax who seeks to use his fortune to find a new title to replace "The Destroyer".

9.title: Fame
9.plot: Quill starts his own talk show after beating Thanos; to his dismay, everyone seems to hate it, especially the Grandmaster who is rigging the segments to destroy Quill.

10.title: Happy Together
10.plot: After squandering their fortunes, the Guardians are desperate and take what should be a simple transport job. It turns out that what they are transporting is a mysterious item stolen from the Kree.

11.title: Gotta Get Outta This Place
11.plot: The Guardians must escape from a Kree prison after being accused of stealing a mysterious artifact from the Kree.

12.title: Long Distance Runaround
12.plot: The Guardians track down Howard the Duck to find out who set them up and why, but they don't get far before Phyla the Accuser catches up to them to deliver some Kree justice.

13.title: You Don't Own Me
13.plot: Phyla-Veil reluctantly teams up with the Guardians to bring The Collection to justice for destroying her home planet.

14.title: Black Vortex, Part 1

0.title: Origins
0.plot: The adventures of Star Lord, Rocket Racoon, Drax the Destroyer, Gamora and Groot prior to the formation of the Guardians of the Galaxy.

1.title: Road to Knowhere
1.plot: The newly-christened Guardians of the Galaxy come into possession of a dangerous artifact that has Thanos' new second in charge, Korath, after them.

2.title: Knowhere to Run
2.plot: The GUARDIANS struggle to subdue the suddenly-sprung-to-life Celestial head that is the KNOWHERE space colony, as well as storm KORATH's ship to rescue Quill, Gamora and the mysterious CryptoCube that holds the Cosmic Seed.

3.title: One in a Million You
3.plot: Feeling underappreciated, Rocket accepts an offer to work for The Collector, only to realize his "job" is merely as another prisoner in The Collector's collection.

4.title: Take the Milano and Run
4.plot: The guardians crash land on a space station run by the grandmaster.

5.title: Can't Fight This Seedling
5.plot: When Groot is infected by a parasitic fungus, the Guardians must undertake a perilous journey in order to save him.

6.title: Undercover Angle
6.plot: Caught red-handed by Titus, the Guardians are coerced into infiltrating a notorious gang of weapons dealers known as the Black Order.

7.title: The Backstabbers
7.plot: Gamora gets mixed up in a dangerous game while trying to pit her siblings, Nebula and Korath, against each other.

8.title: Hitchin' a Ride
8.plot: When Groot is infected by a super-evolved Venom Symbiote, Rocket must go to extreme measures to save his leafy friend.

9.title: We Are Family
9.plot: Rocket is abducted and taken back to his home planet, Half World.

10.title: Bad Moon Rising
10.plot: The Guardians encounter a living planet that's fallen under the control of a revived Ronan.

11.title: Space Cowboys
11.plot: The Guardians get caught up in the deadly rivalry between The Collector and The Grandmaster.

12.title: Crystal Blue Persuasion
12.plot: The Guardians must help save the City of Attilan from Ronan.

13.title: Stuck in the Metal with You
13.plot: The Guardians find the Asgardian Destroyer Armor that leads to an epic battle pitting the Detroyer Armor against Drax the Destroyer.

14.title: Don't Stop Believin'
14.plot: Quill goes missing while following the Cryptocube's readings.

15.title: Accidents Will Happen
15.plot: The Guardians must stop Ronan's plan to blow up the Kree Supreme Intelligence.

16.title: We Are the World Tree
16.plot: In search of the Cosmic Seed, the Guardians unexpectedly find themselves in Asgard where they must outwit Thor and Angela in order to discover the seed's origins.

17.title: Come and Gut Your Love
17.plot: When Starlord's jilted ex-girlfriends learn that he's a prince, they team up and come after him for payback.

18.title: Asgard War Part One: Lightnin' Strikes
18.plot: When Asgard attacks Spartax, Quill and the Guardians become caught in the middle trying to expose the deception behind the conflict.

19.title: Asgard War Part Two: Rescue Me
19.plot: The Guardians and Asgardians team up to rescue Quill from Thanos.

20.title: Fox on the Run
20.plot: Gamora attempts to make amends for her past misdeeds only to find herself ensnared in a deadly trap set by Nebula, Ronan and the Grandmaster.

21.title: Inhuman Touch
21.plot: The Guardians visit the Inhumans to find out what Maximus knows about the Cosmic Seed, but become caught up in the mad Inhumans' treachery once again.

22.title: Welcome Back
22.plot: When the Guardians discover that the Cosmic Seed is back on Earth, Quill must return to his hometown and team up with an old nemesis to find the Seed before Korath.

23.title: I've Been Searching So Long
23.plot: When the Guardians' search for the Cosmic Seed brings them to Earth, they are forced to confront Ronan, Nebula and Thanos.

24.title: I Feel the Earth Move
24.plot: The Guardians must battle a Cosmic Seed supercharged Thanos who takes control of the Earth and molds it into his personal planetary weapon of mass destruction.

25.title: Won't Get Fooled Again
25.plot: The Guardians discover that Yondu has been impersonating them in order to con unsuspecting victims.

26.title: Jingle Bell Rock
26.plot: The team stages a Christmas Carol inspired con-job in order to frighten a despot out of his ill-gotten riches and free his enslaved people.

0.title: Shorts
0.plot: After the Milano crashes on a planet, the crew works to acquire the parts to repair it. The story is told in six shorts that premiered before season 2 of the show.

1.title: Stayin' Alive
1.plot: The Guardians discover that Thanos' asteroid, Sanctuary, is being kept in an Avengers' secured facility.

2.title: Evolution Rock
2.plot: The Guardians must team up with the Avengers to discover the secrets of Thanos' asteroid.

3.title: Lyin' Eyes
3.plot: Rocket and Drax wake up with no memory of the previous night and it is up to the Guardians to piece together what happened.

4.title: Free Bird
4.plot: While the Guardians search for the missing sarcophagus, Groot finds a mysterious egg and does everything in his power to protect it.

5.title: Girls Just Wanna Have Fun
5.plot: The Guardians must escort the rebellious Rigellian princess Tana back to her home world for her coming-of-age ceremony.

6.title: Black Helmet Woman
6.plot: The Guardians help Gamora's sister, Nebula, infiltrate the the Believers flagship.

7.title: Right Place, Wrong Time
7.plot: Quill and Gamora must battle the High Evolutionary and his minions.

8.title: Me and You and a Dog Named Cosmo
8.plot: Knowhere hosts a peace conference for the Rigelians and the Empathetics. While undercover on a Believers ship, Cosmo's powers are taken from him.

9.title: Can't Get It Out of My Head
9.plot: With the Believer's flagship embeds itself in the brain of Knowhere, the residents of the planetoid are turned into zombies.

10.title: Rock Your Baby
10.plot: The cocoon opens reveling a baby Warlock. The Guardians must guide Warlock to keep his powers in check.

11.title: Symbiote War Part 1: Wild World
11.plot: Groot's homeworld is overrun by symbiotes and they try to take the World Pod for themselves and use it to conquer the universe.

12.title: Symbiote War Part 2: I Will Survive
12.plot: The Guardians must team up with Quill's sister in order to stop a symbiote-infested comet from hitting Spartax.

13.title: Symbiote War Part 3: Thunder Road
13.plot: The symbiote hitches a ride to Asgard and after it takes over other Asgardians, it is up to the Guardians to stop them, the World Tree and all of existence.

14.title: Back in Black
14.plot: The Guardians meet Sam Alexander, a human teenager experimenting with his father's Nova helmet. But, they aren't the only ones that know about the helmet's power.

15.title: Knights in Black Helmets
15.plot: The Guardians track J'Son and Mantis who are trying to manipulate Sam by dropping clues about his father's location.

16.title: Nova Me, Nova You
16.plot: Sam returns to his hometown, but the Guardians, Nova Corp, and J'son aren't far behind.

17.title: Mr. Roboto
17.plot: Needing a weapon to defeat J'Son in the Nova helmet, the Guardians turn to master weapons maker Ja Kyee Lrurt.

18.title: Destroyer
18.plot: The Guardians travel to Drax's homeworld in hopes of summoning the Warlock to help in their battle. An unexpected encounter with Drax's past complicates things.

19.title: You Can't Always Get What You Want
19.plot: Rocket enlists the help of the Warlock to re-evolve his family.

20.title: I've Seen All Good People
20.plot: Gamora trains Warlock to be a strong and powerful warrior like herself, but when Gamora's lessons become too intense, Warlock clams up and is kidnapped by the Collector.

21.title: Another One Bites the Dust
21.plot: When Quill and Warlock are hunted by J'son and the Black Order, Quill teaches Warlock the importance of never letting himself slip into the path of evil.

22.title: It's Tricky
22.plot: During the Xandrian Feast of the Three Grinning Moons, the Guardians must pull a reverse heist by planting a dangerous weapon inside a Nova Corps vault.

23.title: You're No Good
23.plot: Warlock has gone dark! By absorbing J'son into his gem, Warlock has become Dark Warlock with his sights set on conquering the galaxy, starting with Spartax.

24.title: Behind Gold Eyes
24.plot: The Guardians and Nova battle Dark Warlock (Magus) and J'Son on Planet Y. Can our heroes save their friend Warlock and the universe before it's too late?

25.title: Unfortunate Son
25.plot: In order to save the Guardians from the ruthless asteroid Korvac, Quill must bust J'Son out of prison on Spartax and in the process he sees a new side of his father.

imdb.plot outline: Star-Lord, the brash adventurer who, sets out to save the universe from its greatest threats, joins forces with a quartet of disparate misfits - fan-favorite Rocket Raccoon, a tree-like humanoid named Groot, the enigmatic, expert fighter Gamora and the rough-edged warrior Drax the Destroyer.
imdb.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
plot: The adventures of a band of space warriors who work to protect the universe from the evil overlord Thanos.

Star-Lord, the brash adventurer who, sets out to save the universe from its greatest threats, joins forces with a quartet of disparate misfits - fan-favorite Rocket Raccoon, a tree-like humanoid named Groot, the enigmatic, expert fighter Gamora and the rough-edged warrior Drax the Destroyer.::marvel Television
